attributes.action: Give cinemas and theaters the support they deserve.
attributes.additional_details: To save the cinema and theater industry and save jobs.
attributes.background: Cineworld have announced that they are considering closing their cinemas temporarily as they are in a position where they can't continue. 5000+ jobs are at risk at Cineworld and other chains (like Odeon, Vue and independent cinemas) could follow if action isn't taken. Something needs to be done.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Offer more support to the arts (particularly Theatres and Music) amidst COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320711

Provide increased support to the cinema industry to protect it and employees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/553300
